section.title: JBoss WS Overview
section.para: JBossWS is a web service framework developed as part of the JBoss Application Server. It implements the JAX-WS specification that defines a programming model and run-time architecture for implementing web services in Java, targeted at the Java Platform, Enterprise Edition 5 (Java EE 5)

section.title: Set JBossWS Runtime Location
section.para: Open Window > Preferences > Web Services > JBossWS Preferences. In this Page , you can set JBossWS Runtime.
Now JBoss Tools only support JBoss EAP or JBoss AS as JBossWS Runtime.
After set JBoss WS Runtime, click OK button to save the JBoss WS Runtime location.

section.title: Set default Server and Runtime
section.para: Open Window > Preferences > Web Services > Server and Runtime. In this page, you can set default server and runtime.
For ease of use, the better way is to set runtime = JBoss WS.
After set server and runtime, click Aplly button to save the value.
